text: Hi I'm wondering if you might possibly be willing to donate some of your earnings to a charity?
I really don't want to do that. I sort of didn't come here to perform charity.
It's a great charity though. It's for Save the Children.
Oh...I know that charity. Seriously, is it for Save the Children?
Yes it's for Save the Children. You don't even have to donate all of your earnings. You could if you choose donate part of your earnings. It's up to you.
Killing me here.  Okay, but I'm really not in the sharing mood right now. Okay. I will donate 35 cents.
I know you didn't want to donate but doesn't it make you feel good at the same time. Thank you.
No, actually it makes me feel like I gave in when I didn't want to.
I don't want you to feel like you're having to make a donation.
I think that is how most people feel about giving to charity, lol.
It is a great cause and even the most minimal amount can help a lot!

I know but sometimes you wonder you know. My daughter "adopted" a child from one of those programs and the kid had video games. My daughter didn\'t even have video games at the time. We were like: what?!
This charity is not like that at all.
Well, there is the 35 cents.
And how much would you personally miss that 35 cents.
Two dollars is a very small amount to begin with. Take 35 cents out of that and proportionally you miss it a lot. I did consider a nickel you know.
Well I think you made the right choice in saying you'd donate the 35 cents. I know sometimes its hard to part with money. Trust me I've been there myself many times.
How much did you give? Just curious...
I'm donating all of it. Thank you though for donating what you did.
I wouldn't have done that, ever.  No need to thank me; ultimately my choice.
This is true. You take care.
